001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
008import java.util.Optional;
009import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
010
011import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
012
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogAppender.AppenderProvider;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties.Property;
015
016/**
017 * Register appenders by name.
018 */
019public sealed interface LogAppenderRegistry extends AppenderProvider permits DefaultAppenderRegistry {
020
021        /**
022         * Register a provider by {@link URI#getScheme() scheme}.
023         * @param scheme URI scheme to match for.
024         * @param provider provider for scheme.
025         */
026        public void register(String scheme, AppenderProvider provider);
027
028        /**
029         * Creates a log appender registry.
030         * @return appender registry.
031         */
032        public static LogAppenderRegistry of() {
033                return new DefaultAppenderRegistry();
034        }
035
036}
037
038record AppenderConfig(String name, @Nullable LogOutput output, @Nullable LogEncoder encoder) {
039
040        AppenderConfig {
041                validateName(name);
042        }
043
044        private static String validateName(String name) {
045                if (name.isBlank()) {
046                        throw new IllegalStateException("Appender name cannot be null. name=" + name);
047                }
048                if (name.contains(" ") || name.contains("\t") || name.contains("\n") || name.contains("\r")) {
049                        throw new IllegalStateException("Appender name cannot have whitespace");
050                }
051                if (name.contains(LogProperties.SEP)) {
052                        throw new IllegalStateException("Appender name cannot have '" + LogProperties.SEP + "'");
053                }
054                return name;
055        }
056}
057
058final class DefaultAppenderRegistry implements LogAppenderRegistry {
059
060        private final Map<String, AppenderProvider> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
061
062        static final Property<URI> fileProperty = Property.builder().toURI().build(LogProperties.FILE_PROPERTY);
063
064        static final Property<List<String>> appendersProperty = Property.builder()
065                .toList()
066                .orElse(List.of())
067                .build(LogProperties.APPENDERS_PROPERTY);
068
069        @Override
070        public LogAppender provide(URI uri, String name, LogConfig properties) {
071                throw new NoSuchElementException(uri.toString());
072        }
073
074        @Override
075        public void register(String scheme, AppenderProvider provider) {
076                providers.put(scheme, provider);
077        }
078
079        /*
080         * TODO The shit in here is a mess because auto configuration of appenders based on
081         * properties is complicated particularly because we want to support Spring Boots
082         * configuration OOB.
083         */
084        static List<LogAppender> defaultAppenders(LogConfig config, List<String> appenderNames) {
085                List<LogAppender> appenders = new ArrayList<>();
086                fileAppender(config).ifPresent(appenders::add);
087                if (appenderNames.isEmpty()) {
088                        appenderNames = appendersProperty.get(config.properties()).value(List.of());
089                }
090
091                for (String appenderName : appenderNames) {
092                        appenders.add(appender(appenderName, config));
093                }
094                if (appenders.isEmpty()) {
095                        var consoleAppender = defaultConsoleAppender(config);
096                        appenders.add(consoleAppender);
097                }
098                return appenders;
099        }
100
101        private static LogAppender defaultConsoleAppender(LogConfig config) {
102                String name = LogAppender.CONSOLE_APPENDER_NAME;
103
104                var output = outputProperty(LogAppender.APPENDER_OUTPUT_PROPERTY, name, config).get(config.properties())
105                        .value(() -> LogOutput.ofStandardOut());
106
107                var encoderProperty = encoderProperty(LogAppender.APPENDER_ENCODER_PROPERTY, name, config);
108
109                var encoder = resolveEncoder(config, output, encoderProperty);
110
111                var consoleAppender = LogAppender.builder(LogAppender.CONSOLE_APPENDER_NAME)
112                        .output(LogOutput.ofStandardOut())
113                        .encoder(encoder)
114                        .build()
115                        .provide(LogAppender.CONSOLE_APPENDER_NAME, config);
116                return consoleAppender;
117        }
118
119        static Optional<LogAppender> fileAppender(LogConfig config) {
120                final String name = LogAppender.FILE_APPENDER_NAME;
121                var outputProperty = fileProperty //
122                        .map(u -> config.outputRegistry().provide(u, name, config.properties()));
123                var encoderProperty = encoderProperty(LogAppender.APPENDER_ENCODER_PROPERTY, name, config);
124
125                return fileProperty //
126                        .map(u -> appender(name, config, outputProperty, encoderProperty)) //
127                        .get(config.properties()) //
128                        .optional();
129        }
130
131        private static final Property<Boolean> defaultsAppenderBufferProperty = Property.builder()
132                .map(s -> Boolean.parseBoolean(s))
133                .orElse(false)
134                .build(LogProperties.concatKey("defaults.appender.buffer"));
135
136        static LogAppender appender( //
137                        String name, LogConfig config) {
138                var builder = new AppenderConfig(name, null, null);
139                var outputProperty = outputProperty(LogAppender.APPENDER_OUTPUT_PROPERTY, name, config);
140                var encoderProperty = encoderProperty(LogAppender.APPENDER_ENCODER_PROPERTY, name, config);
141                return appender(builder, config, outputProperty, encoderProperty);
142        }
143
144        static LogAppender appender( //
145                        AppenderConfig appenderConfig, //
146                        LogConfig config) {
147                String name = appenderConfig.name();
148                var outputProperty = outputProperty(LogAppender.APPENDER_OUTPUT_PROPERTY, name, config);
149                var encoderProperty = encoderProperty(LogAppender.APPENDER_ENCODER_PROPERTY, name, config);
150                return appender(appenderConfig, config, outputProperty, encoderProperty);
151        }
152
153        static LogAppender appender( //
154                        AppenderConfig appenderConfig, //
155                        LogConfig config, //
156                        Property<LogOutput> outputProperty, Property<LogEncoder> encoderProperty) {
157
158                @Nullable
159                LogOutput output = appenderConfig.output();
160                @Nullable
161                LogEncoder encoder = appenderConfig.encoder();
162                var properties = config.properties();
163
164                if (output == null) {
165                        output = outputProperty.get(properties).value();
166                }
167
168                if (output instanceof LogEncoder e) {
169                        encoder = e;
170                }
171
172                if (encoder == null) {
173                        encoder = resolveEncoder(config, output, encoderProperty);
174                }
175
176                return defaultsAppenderBufferProperty.get(properties).value() ? new BufferLogAppender(output, encoder)
177                                : new DefaultLogAppender(output, encoder);
178        }
179
180        private static LogEncoder resolveEncoder(LogConfig config, LogOutput output, Property<LogEncoder> encoderProperty) {
181                @Nullable
182                LogEncoder encoder;
183                var _output = output;
184                encoder = encoderProperty.get(config.properties()).value(() -> {
185                        var encoderRegistry = config.encoderRegistry();
186                        return encoderRegistry.encoderForOutputType(_output.type());
187                });
188                return encoder;
189        }
190
191        static LogAppender appender( //
192                        String name, //
193                        LogConfig config, //
194                        Property<LogOutput> outputProperty, Property<LogEncoder> encoderProperty) {
195                var builder = new AppenderConfig(name, null, null);
196                return appender(builder, config, outputProperty, encoderProperty);
197
198        }
199
200        private static Property<LogOutput> outputProperty(String propertyName, String name, LogConfig config) {
201                return Property.builder() //
202                        .toURI() //
203                        .map(u -> config.outputRegistry().provide(u, name, config.properties())) //
204                        .buildWithName(propertyName, name);
205        }
206
207        private static Property<LogEncoder> encoderProperty(String propertyName, String name, LogConfig config) {
208                return Property.builder() //
209                        .toURI() //
210                        .map(u -> config.encoderRegistry().provide(u, name, config.properties())) //
211                        .buildWithName(propertyName, name);
212        }
213
214}
